name: Aluminum recovery, transport, to plant
description: Separate unit processes are shown for automotive and UBC (used beverage container) scrap; however, it was determined that the recovery rates and processing requirements for these 2 markets are similar, and thus the results for the 2 markets are the same. Atmospheric, waterborne, and solid waste emissions represent process emissions only, not fuel combustion emissions.,  Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has  undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet  undergone a formal validation process. Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.
